import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./Login.css"; const Login = () => { // Change 'login' to 'Login' const [action, setAction] = useState("Login"); return (
{action}
setAction(action === "Log in" ? "Sign up" : "Log in")}> Sign up
{action === "Lo"}
Forgot passwordClick here!!
{setAction("Sign up")}}> Sign up
{setAction("Login")}}> Login
); }; export default Login; // Change 'login' to 'Login'
